welcome: Welcome, use /help command to know what you can do
help:
Use /register command to register here and save your preferences
Use /follow NAME_CHANNEL command to follow a new channel
Use /list command to show your followed list channels
Use /unfollow NAME_CHANNEL command to remove a channel from your list
Use /check command to see which of the channels you follow are live
correct_register: User registered, now can use the service
need_register: You must first register for the service
no_followed_channels: Currently you aren't following any channels
need_channel: It is necessary to specify the channel
just_followed: You are already following this channel
not_followed: You are not following this channel
no_channels_live: Currently, no channels you follow are live
